Name: Beholder's Revenge
Desc:
The Beholder counterattacks the enemy. The Beholder marks the Revenge Stigma on the enemies, inflicting damage on them whom the Dark Knight directly attacks at regular intervals.
In addition, the Beholder Shock is reinforced by connecting more deeply with the Beholder.
The Beholder's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Required Skill: Beholder Shock II Lv. 20 or higher

Desc.New:

In addition, the Beholder Shock is reinforced by connecting more deeply with the Beholder.
The Beholder's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

H.Old:
Attacks 10 enemies at 309% Damage 7 times after the Dark Knight attacks them directly.
Cooldown: 5 sec.
Beholder Shock III: Attacks up to 10 enemies at 630% Damage 7 times, and shoots condensed Dark Aura x4 to attack up to 3 enemies additionally at 423% Damage 5 times.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
